bolt.web.coffee.io
Interface CoffeeGraphOptions

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoffeeGraphCommand
public interface CoffeeGraphOptions

Implementation prototype for the output options generated by Coffee-Graph.

Author:
Matt Bolt

Method Summary
 File getOutputFile()
          The javascript output file for the Coffee-Graph compilation output.
 List<File> getSourceFiles()
          A List of File instances representing the source files or directories to build the dependency graph for.
 boolean isBare()
          Omits the javascript security wrapper for compiled output.
 boolean isCompile()
          Compiles the input CoffeeScript source and outputs a single javascript file.
 boolean isHelp()
          Prints the input options for Coffee-Graph
 boolean isPrint()
          Prints the file order on a single line, single-space delimited.
 boolean isPrintLine()
          Prints the file order on multiple lines, one per line.
 boolean isPrintTree()
          Prints an expanded identifier dependency tree for the CoffeeScript source provided.
 boolean isVersion()
          Prints the Coffee-Graph, CoffeeScript, and Java version information.
 

Method Detail

isPrint

boolean isPrint()
Prints the file order on a single line, single-space delimited.

Returns:
true if Coffee-Graph should output the file order on a single line.

isPrintLine

boolean isPrintLine()
Prints the file order on multiple lines, one per line.

Returns:
true if Coffee-Graph should output the file order, one file per line.

isPrintTree

boolean isPrintTree()
Prints an expanded identifier dependency tree for the CoffeeScript source provided.

Returns:
true if Coffee-Graph should output the dependency tree.

isHelp

boolean isHelp()
Prints the input options for Coffee-Graph

Returns:
true if Coffee-Graph should output the usage.

isVersion

boolean isVersion()
Prints the Coffee-Graph, CoffeeScript, and Java version information.

Returns:
true if Coffee-Graph should output the version information.

isCompile

boolean isCompile()
Compiles the input CoffeeScript source and outputs a single javascript file.

Returns:
true if CoffeeGraph should order and compile the CoffeeScript source.

isBare

boolean isBare()
Omits the javascript security wrapper for compiled output.

Returns:
true if the CoffeeScript compiler should omit the security wrapper.

getSourceFiles

List<File> getSourceFiles()
A List of File instances representing the source files or directories to build the dependency graph for.

getOutputFile

File getOutputFile()
The javascript output file for the Coffee-Graph compilation output.
